doc.title: Crimson Pie
doc.plot: A restaurant gets a call from the Prime Minister of Canada. The Prime Minister informs the restaurant that President Clinton is in town, and if they don't deliver a pizza within 20 minutes, he's threatening to shut the parlor down. When taking the Prime Minister's order, the phone line goes dead. Now they must race against time to try and repair the phone line so they can confirm the order. Conflict has not only struck upon the parlor, but it soon strikes amongst each other...
